title: Bolsa de Iniciação à Investigação (BII) – Researcher
organisation: Instituto Politécnico de Leiria – Centro de Competências em Cibersegurança
bullets: Participated in technical meetings to define and align cybersecurity initiatives.
Supported 30+ organisations in strengthening their cybersecurity posture through assessments, guidance, and tailored improvement plans delivered both on-site and remotely.
Co-authored and produced practical materials, including cybersecurity guides, checklists, and reference frameworks (e.g. risk matrix, business continuity, asset management, incident response).
Helped prepare and deliver workshops to raise awareness and improve security practices across organisations.
Assisted in the development of diagnostic tools for risk evaluation and incident response readiness.
Produced technical reports consolidating findings and actionable recommendations for adoption by organisations.

title: RUN-EU Cybersecurity and IoT Programme
bullets: Engaged in intercultural teamwork and creative problem-solving with peers from 7 European universities.
Co-developed proposals for SME cybersecurity training and social engineering awareness modules.
Applied RUN-EU pedagogical principles to design innovative and challenge-based learning activities.
